resources.string: Something went wrong. Please try again.
Server error! Please try again later.
Can’t find the patient in this list?
Enter patient’s date of birth in DD/MM/YYYY
Phone number cannot be less than %1$s digits
Phone number cannot be more than %1$s digits

By tapping below, you confirm that any patient data you enter here has been obtained under appropriate informed consent. This means that the patient or legal guardian knows that you are entering their personal data into the app, understands what data is being collected, and knows that they may be contacted via SMS, WhatsApp, or other methods using the phone number provided in the app.

Anyone authorized by you, or the healthcare provider for whom you work, will have access to the patient data and information you enter here. By using the app you confirm that the patient or legal guardian understands who will have access to the data obtained through this app and consents to that access.
Age cannot be more than 120 years
Age cannot be equal to 0 years
Once approved, you will have access to patient records from your clinic.
You can now see all patient data for your clinic
Once verified, you will have access to patient records from your clinic.
Verification successful! Patient records now visible.
You can only be logged in on one device at a time
You have been logged out of your previous device.
Systolic should be more than diastolic
Enter a valid date in DD/MM/YYYY
Date cannot be in the future

Make sure you have a working internet connection to sync patient records.
Sync servers are down at the moment. Please try again later or get in touch with your supervisor.
You will be taken to Google Play Store to update Simple.
Please try again after some time or get in touch with your supervisor.
How to use the Simple app

Choose ‘RBS’ if you are not sure.

Access to Simple is denied. Please contact your supervisor if you think this is an error.\n\nIf your access is restored, uninstall Simple and install from the Play store.
